Cable:AttachStartTo.description: Attached the beginning of this cable to another Actor at a specific bone or relative location

Cable:AttachEndTo.description: Attached the beginning of this cable to another Actor at a specific bone or relative location

Cable:DetachEnd.description: Detaches the End of this Cable

Cable:DetachStart.description: Detaches the Start of this Cable

Cable:SetAngularLimits.description: Sets the Physics Angular Limits of this cable

Cable:SetCableSettings.description: Set the overall settings for this cable (visuals only)

Cable:SetForces.description: Set the forces the cable has applied (visuals only)

Cable:SetLinearLimits.description: Sets the Physics Linear Limits of this cable

Cable:SetRenderingSettings.description: Set the rendering settings of this cable (visuals only)
